job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.description: pstrongMachine Learning Data EngineerstrongppstrongAustin TXstrongppstrongLong term strongppstrongstrongppstrongJob SummarystrongppAs a part of our Decision Sciences group you will work with our clients to help define solutions for institutionalizing datadriven decision making in a cost effective and scalable manner The focus is not only in driving analytical outcomes but defining approaches to automate the operationalizing of the predictions within our client applications The Machine Learning ML Engineer with an interest in a variety of disciplines will strive to build frameworks and supporting utilities to enhance the experience of our data scientistsppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppDevelop and support a platform that enables data scientists to rapidly develop train and experiment with machine learning models Collaborate with other engineers and data scientists to design high performance architectures to support development of machine learning models data wrangling and data provisioning pipelines and metadata rich data lake repositoriesppImplement POCs and make recommendations for new ML accelerator toolsppbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanRequired SkillsstrongppStrong programming experience building data integration frameworks using Python onpremppStrong experience with ETL patterns to support data science is requiredppExperience with AWS or Azure ML stack is desiredppIndustry experience as a Machine Learning EngineerppStatistical background is a nice to havepulliBachelors Degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science Electrical Engineering Mathematics Computer Applications Information Systems or Engineering is requiredliul
